app_about_text: Stem ZIPper versione {{version}}. Gestisci e comprimi i tuoi stem audio con facilità.
app_max_size_tooltip: Imposta la dimensione target per archivio ZIP.
pack_error_invalid_max_size: Inserisci un valore maggiore di 0 e al massimo {{max}} MB. Ripristino a {{reset}} MB.
app_drop_helper: Rilascia una cartella ovunque nella finestra
app_select_hint: Trascina o seleziona una cartella per iniziare
pack_error_disabled: Scegli una cartella per attivare la compressione
dialog_open_folder_prompt: Aprire la cartella con i file ZIP creati?
dialog_overwrite_text: Questa cartella contiene già file stems-*.zip. I file esistenti verranno sovrascritti. Continuare?
dev_error_dev_only: La generazione di dati di test è disponibile solo in modalità sviluppatore.
warn_email_invalid: Doesn’t look like a valid email.
btn_pack_disabled_missing_required: Please fill Title, Artist and License.
pack_info_skip_stereo_split_non_wav: Skipped stereo split for {{file}} (not a WAV or unsupported format).
pack_warn_split_fallback: Couldn't split {{file}}; packed the original file instead.
batch_warn_lossy_zip_gain_low: Lossy file compresses poorly (~0–5%): may exceed {{max_zip_size}}.
batch_warn_file_exceeds_max_zip: File is larger than max archive size {{max_zip_size}}.
badge_no_zip_gain_hint: Already compressed; ZIP usually won't shrink it.
hint_split_mono_feasible: Will split L/R to fit under the max size.
warn_split_mono_failed: Split Mono failed for {{name}}. Packed the original file instead.
pack_badge_no_zip_gain_hint: Already compressed; ZIP usually won't shrink it.
pack_error_no_files: No supported audio files were found.
error_7z_binary_missing: 7z binary is missing. Install the platform binary under resources/bin.
error_7z_spawn_failed: 7z compression failed. Verify the bundled binary and file permissions.
pack_error_unknown: Packing failed due to an unknown error.
row_reason_too_large_zip: Too large for ZIP; switch to 7z to include.
pack_row_reason_too_large_zip: Too large for ZIP; switch to 7z to include.
